title: 潘马斯如何修改菜园野外生成的概率
author: _CrazyNut_
txt_content: RT 复活点旁边长一堆菜。。

replies.author: _CrazyNut_
replies.txt_content:
# Garden spread rate. 100 means a garden spawns every tick. 1 means a garden spawns with a probability of 1% per tick. [range: 1 ~ 100, default: 30]
    I:gardenSpreadRate=5

已经自行解决/。。应该是这个吧。。
